Name: Blood Bound Band
HPText: Each brother has [HP] hp per player character [MIN]

SetupTraits.Name: Blood Brothers
SetupTraits.Description: To determine which brothers the Band consists of, roll a d10 4 times, reroll repeats, or pick 4.

Actions.Name: Strength in Blood
Actions.Description: At the start of the round, this legend may clear a status or mark affecting one of the Brothers.

Actions.Name: Blood Bond
Actions.Description: Swap places with a Blood Brother in range 3, removing and placing both characters.

Actions.Name: Setup
Actions.Description: Dash 3, then any brother gains stealth. That brother's next ability treats all targets as bloodied.

Actions.Name: Serrated Knife
Actions.Description: A character in range 4 takes 2 damage. If they're bloodied, they take 3 damage twice instead.

Actions.Name: First Blood
Effects: May dash 1 before and after attack.
Attack gains +1 dash and deals +2 damage on hit or miss per fallen brother.

PhasesDescription: When only one brother is remaining, the band goes into Phase II.

Phases.Name: 1 Brother
Phases.Description: If only one Brother is remaining, they become unstoppable and gain +1 action for the rest of combat.

Actions.Name: The Boot
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe is shoved 1. If they're bloody, they are instead shoved 3.

Actions.Name: Flying Dropkick
Actions.Description: Boots rushes 3 towards a foe. Then, if they are adjacent to that foe, that foe takes take [D]+[fray] and is shoved 3.

Actions.Name: Grapple
Actions.Description: Fixer marks an adjacent foe. While marked, that foe must save if it attempts to break adjacency the first time in a round. On a failed save, it becomes unable to exit adjacency with Fixer by any means for the rest of the current round. On a successful save, the mark and this effect ends, but the foe is weakened.

Actions.Name: Poison Gas
Actions.AreaEffect: Characters in the area take 6 damage. Then, they must save or take 6 damage again and become blinded. Blinded characters fail this save.

Actions.Name: Feline Felicity
Actions.Description: Teleport 3, then may deal 2 damage to an adjacent foe. Bloodied foes take 2 damage twice.

Actions.Name: Fan of Nya-ives
Actions.AreaEffect: Foes take 3 damage. Bloodied foes take 3 damage twice. Then, Cats may teleport 2.

Actions.Name: Great Aura of Skulduggery
Actions.Description: Until the start of their next turn, Sharkie is immobile and gains Aura 2. Sharkie and allies in the aura have evasion and counter. Foes that trigger counter or evasion are also shoved 2 after the triggering ability resolves.

Actions.Name: Great Swindle
Actions.Description: A foe in range 3 is sealed, then must save or swap places with Sharkie, teleporting. Bloodied characters fail the save.

Actions.Name: Nighthaunt
Actions.Description: Pale teleports 3, then becomes intangible and gains phasing until the start of their next turn. This action grants evasion instead if they are the only Brother active.

Combo.Name: Midnight Blade
Combo.Effects: Deals half damage if foe has any amount of vigor. Deals bonus damage if foe is bloodied.

Actions.Name: Ricochet Shot
Effects: A different foe in range 3 from the original target takes [fray] damage.
Deals bonus damage against bloodied foes.

Actions.Name: Spark
Actions.Description: Choose a foe in range 6 that has not acted this round. At the end of that foe's next turn, they explode in a small blast area effect for [D]+[fray] piercing damage, dealing damage to all foes other than them in the area. Summon a pit under them. If they are standing in a pit when the explosion happens, they are stunned and also take damage.

Actions.Name: Blood Pyre
Actions.Effects: Summon a pit under every bloodied character in the area. Deals bonus damage to characters inside pits.

Actions.Name: Bloody Bond
Actions.Description: Mark an ally in range 4. While marked and in range, that ally has resistance to all damage, but Broker must sacrifice 3 at the end of that ally's turn.

Actions.Name: Bounty Hunt
Actions.Description: A foe in range 6 is marked. While marked, abilities against the target gain true strike, and allies gain +1 boon to attack the foe. Using this mark again transfers it. A foe can end this mark by ending their turn more than 2 spaces away from any Brother.

Actions.Name: Weakening Venom
Actions.Description: A foe in range 6 is pacified+. They can purge the venom from their system at the end of any turn they attack, ending this effect.

Tactics: The band are a bunch of nasty fighters that may seem unassuming at first, but become very dangerous when foes are bloodied. They are a fairly straightforward fight, but can benefit from looking at what each brother can do to combo their abilities together. Characters might try to defeat them all in the same round to limit the effects of their blessings, or pick off a particularly troublesome brother early.
